amendatorysection.para: Sections 76-101 to 76-123 shall be so interpreted and construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law of those states which enact them.

annotation.para: Uniform act is to be construed so as to effectuate its general purpose. Ellingrod v. Trombla, 168 Neb. 264, 95 N.W.2d 635 (1959).
